title: FS: Tris Speaker - Missing Red Ink

posts.post_title: FS: Tris Speaker - Missing Red Ink
posts.post_content:
Hello,

For sale is a Tris Speaker, SC 350/25, PSA 2, Missing Red Ink card. The card is well-centered and has great corners, but grades a 2 due to glue reside on the back left side of the card and faint crease on the front. Tougher Factory 25 back to boot!

Asking SALE PENDING (PP f/f), price includes shipping.

Thanks for looking!

Andy
Bump with price reduction for this unique Speaker!
